name: react-web-pak-babel
description: This file NOT to be published! Its for BOTH code under development AND running webpack and babel

scripts.//start: runs http (serve)r which webpack provides for auto-update development. No bundle.js built!
scripts.//: run below as: npm run-script buildBundle_outLibWindowType
scripts.//buildBundleServe: builds bundle_serve.js in dist_webpack for development. For running index.html directly
scripts.buildBundle_outLibWindowType: node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack build -c ./webpack.config_devServer.js && echo run dist_webpack/index.html directly
